Label.en: Anyway... Henri IV wanted to join it with the Tuileries castle in the 16th century
Label.fr: Quoi qu'il en soit... Henri IV voulut ensuite le réuninr au château des Tuileries au XVIe siècle
Label.es: Anyway... Henri IV wanted to join it with the Tuileries castle in the 16th century
Label.zh: Anyway... Henri IV wanted to join it with the Tuileries castle in the 16th century

Label.en: But this never panned out, and the Tuileries castle was burned to the ground in 1871...
Label.fr: Mais cela ne se produisit jamais et le château des Tuileries fut détruit par le feu en 1871 ...
Label.es: But this never panned out, and the Tuileries castle was burned to the ground in 1871...
Label.zh: But this never panned out, and the Tuileries castle was burned to the ground in 1871...

Label.en: It was revolutionaries from the Commune who did the burning...
Label.fr: A l'initiative des révolutionnaires de La Commune de Paris...
Label.es: It was revolutionaries from the commune who did the burning...
Label.zh: It was revolutionaries from the commune who did the burning...

Label.fr: Oui... les insurgés de La Commune de Paris!
